widget.name: AppShell
widget.description: Responsive shell for your application with header, navbar, aside and footer

property.caption: Aside
property.description: Aside configuration, controls width, breakpoints and collapsed state. Required if you use Aside component.

property.caption: Disabled
property.description: If set, Navbar, Aside, Header and Footer components are hidden

property.caption: Footer
property.description: Footer configuration, controls height, offset and collapsed state. Required if you use Footer component.

property.caption: Header
property.description: Header configuration, controls height, offset and collapsed state. Required if you use Header component.

property.caption: Layout
property.description: Determines how Navbar/Aside are arranged relative to Header/Footer

property.caption: Navbar
property.description: Navbar configuration, controls width, breakpoints and collapsed state. Required if you use Navbar component.

property.caption: Offset Scrollbars
property.description: If set, Header and Footer components include styles to offset scrollbars. Based on react-remove-scroll.

property.caption: Padding
property.description: Padding of the main section. Important: use padding prop instead of p.

property.caption: Transition Duration
property.description: Duration of all transitions in ms

property.caption: With Border
property.description: If set, the associated components have a border
